title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Wheeling and dealing with friends gives you great joy today. Fortunately, the charming Libra New Moon in your 11th House of Groups and Friendships is a celestial social lubricant. People seem to relish your company now, because you are genuinely as interested in them as they are in you. Take a few moments alone, here and there, to catch your breath as needed. Focus on building communities and memories by doing your best to network and inspire collaboration and cooperation. And dont forget to have fun in the process. The Dalai Lama teaches, The purpose of our lives is to be happy. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
